value:
Tell me again—this is not Ylisse? Did
Naga make a mistake? Ah, no!
Forget I said anything.

War consumed my world. Those who
survived fought so valiantly... But
averting the apocalypse falls to me.

So you check on all of your troops?
I understand how you feel. It hurts to
lose them.

It looks like Prince Alfonse is a skilled
swordsman. I'd like to spar with him...
You'll arrange it for me? Thank you.

...I was thinking of my home and my
comrades. I'm not yet sure exactly
why I came here...$k$pSomeday, I hope, I'll be able to tell
you more about these things.

You're $Nu?$k$pI've come with greetings for you from
$Nf.

If I keep this up, I can grow
strong—like my father!
Excellent. I feel I'm improving.
My apologies!

This strength will not be wasted.
I must continue to ask for your aid.

You may call me Marth. I can say no
more than this just now. If you require
my help, I offer it to you.

It has been some time since you
summoned me here. Really, I should
be elsewhere. And I am no Hero.$k$pI am grateful to you, though. I can use
the strength you've given me to fulfill
the mission that lies ahead.$k$pThe day will come when I have to
leave, $Nu. $k$pI must return to the land so dear to
me—the one where we all swore to
meet again...$k$pThe one where we promised we
would change our fates. When the
time comes, I hope I can explain.$k$pUnlike the other Heroes, I must guard
my secrets. I cannot open up to you.
But for now, my sword is yours.
はっ！
せやあっ！
ぐっ…！
Drat!
I challenge my fate!
You will not stop me!
I say when it ends!
Hope will never die!
Beaten...
Hmm...
I am searching for someone. I can say no more than that.
If you care to duel, I would be happy to test myself against you.
I am afraid I cannot remove this mask. I have my reasons.
I learned swordsmanship at a young age...from my father.
I may have come to the wrong place...
I wonder what's become of Father and the others...
I have a mission of my own, but I will help you for now.
Yes.
Hmm...
Done.
